title: decrypt the hardware encrypted data
extract: Encryption is the process of translating plain text data (plaintext) into something that appears to be random and meaningless (ciphertext). ... A symmetric key is used during both the encryption and decryption processes. To decrypt a particular piece of ciphertext, the key that was used to encrypt the data must be used.May 30, 2018
